text:
────Hmm...
Wait, does it feel like nothing's finished?

Ugh, where did your usual sense of speed go?
Will we finish before the deadline?

If we don't maintain our usual quality,
the manager will definitely say something.

Well then, I'm leaving now.
See you later!

...I have to finish
...But no, I'm so sleepy...
10 seconds... Just 10 seconds, I'll close my eyes...
It's hard, isn't it, giving advice on relationships?

M-Mikoto-san, you really...
have that kind of... extensive experience, huh?

Yeah, maybe in the past, I was a bit wild.
But I thought it was necessary to refine my expression skills.

──If you want, shall I teach you?
Ways to improve your expression skills even more...
It's like... all love songs, huh?
